mapper.sql: MCHTID, MCHTNAME, IMAGE, TYPE, FLAG, ISDELETE, UPDATETIME
mapper.insert: insert into T_MCHT_IMAGE (MCHTID, MCHTNAME, IMAGE, TYPE, FLAG, ISDELETE, UPDATETIME) values (#{mchtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mchtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update T_MCHT_IMAGE
MCHTNAME = #{mchtname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMAGE = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FLAG = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ISDELETE = #{isdelete,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATETIME = #{updatetime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where MCHTID = #{mchtid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
